def_en: When you reply to something that someone has said or written to you, you say or write an answer to them.
A reply is something that you say or write when you answer someone or answer a letter or advertisement.

def_cn: (在体育比赛中)以得分回应，回敬，
def_en: In sports, if you reply to a goal or a number of points scored by your opponents, you also score a goal or a number of points.

def_cn: (以行动)作出回应，回击，反击
def_en: If you reply to something such as an attack with violence or with another action, you do something in response.
